fullplot: An adaptation of Bishop T.D. Jakes' self-help novel, chronciling a woman's struggle to come to terms with her legacy of abuse, addiction and poverty.
plot: An adaptation of Bishop T.D. Jakes' self-help novel, chronciling a woman's struggle to come to terms with her legacy of abuse, addiction and poverty.
title: Woman Thou Art Loosed

tomatoes.consensus: While Woman is a little less heavy-handed than other message movies, it still feels like an After School Special.
